MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH44 postcode area of Innerleithen affecting properties in Avenuehead and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair due to faulty equipment, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.20pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:44PM on Thursday 29 April 2021.
